channel.title: Server Base
channel.description: I'm currently pulling my hair out trying to pick the right base for a stable pk server. I have been completely ignoring delta, and looking into Project Insanity base. But, in the process, I've come across people stating that Project Insanity is very unstable. If this is true, what base should I use?

item.title: Server Base
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Mill, post:2, topic:398264”]I would recommend PI as it is very easy to work with.[/quote]Yea, either that or Emulous (a more stable version of PI). If you really want a good source (better than PI) I suggest either Hyperion or Azure. But these are harder to code!

Read full topic

item.title: Server Base
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

I would recommend PI as it is very easy to work with.
